Package server

package server
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClientHandler
    Handles communication with a single connected client.
    FileStorage
    FileStorage is responsible for persistent storage of player ratings (MMR).
    FileStorageTest
    Tests for FileStorage.
    GameServer
    GameServer is responsible for managing client connections, matchmaking, and active game sessions.
    GameServerTest
    Test class for GameServer.
    GameSession
    GameSession represents a single active game between two players.
    GameSessionTest
    Tests for GameSession.
